"Photon Art and Technique Discs":
"This is an explanation on how to learn new Photon Arts and Techniques.

Photon Arts and Techniques can be learned by opening the menu and selecting 'Inventory', then going to the 'discs' tab."
"First, select the Photon Arts/Technique Disc you want to learn from your Inventory, then select 'use', and you will be able to learn them."

"After you learned it, go back to the main menu and select 'Equip Weapon'.

Select an empty PA/Tech slot on your weapon, then select what PA or Tech you want to use."
"Once you've done this, make sure to choose ones that you have already learn from the list of available Photon Arts and Techniques."
